alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:12PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Roger Mills, west central Custer and northern Beckham Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 812 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Cheyenne to 8 miles north of Sayre. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Hammon, Strong City, Foss Reservoir, Berlin, and Dempsey. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 29 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor NOAA Weather Radio, local radio stations or available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
